content.text: Metal signs have been a must-use advertising sign for many businesses for centuries because they are very durable and stylish to use.

At Royal Signs & Awnings, we are committed to helping you get high-quality metal signs that will help you attract potential customers. Our Katy team can do customized signs based on your brand, deadline, and budget.
Call Royal Signs & Awnings today at (281) 645-9935 for your Free Consultation!
Royal Signs & Awnings is committed to helping clients look good by creating high-quality metal signs for their storefront.
Outdoor metal signs must catch attention and stay functional under the elements. We understand the importance of these outdoor signs.
Contact Royal Signs & Awnings for a free metal signage consultation. Call (281) 645-9935!
